title: ‘I was terrified of dying’: how one man survived 40 hours adrift in the sea
summary: Rafie Nadi, a 23-year-old, was rescued off the coast of Spain after spending nearly two days adrift with only an inflatable ring and flippers. His survival was attributed to his resourcefulness in the challenging situation. The incident highlights the dangers faced by individuals at sea.

title: The US right claimed free speech was sacred – until the Charlie Kirk killing
summary: Rightwingers who previously criticized leftwing "cancel culture" are now embracing the term "consequence culture." This shift reflects their acknowledgment of accountability for actions and speech. The change highlights a broader cultural debate on freedom of expression and social responsibility.
